“See?” she cooed “No harm done, right?”

The room they found themselves in was a big playroom, clearly meant for true little children. In some way that reassured Emma, since it was much normal than the playroom in Selena’s house, that seemed specifically created for oversized babies.

After a while, a quite sturdy and stern-looking woman in her late thirties entered in the daycare. She was tall, much more tall than Emma was. She had black hair, pulled up into a chignon, and deep and dark green eyes. She was wearing a French maid outfit, not dissimilar from the one Sonia wore too. The unknown woman reached Jessica and said to her “I’m here for Emma Watson.”

Emma nodded again, to weakened by the spanking to try to oppose her.

Emma spat the pacifier out, and said “Home!”

“I’m going!” Emma insisted, and turned her back to the nanny.
Sonia grabbed her by a wrist, and said in a scolding tone “Why do you behave so bratty? What happened to you?”
Emma tried to free herself, but every attempt was in vain: the nanny's grip was too firm. So she instinctively kicked the woman's legs quite hard.
